2fa_request.title: Two-Factor Authentication
2fa_request.description: Select a method to receive your 2FA code.

error.2fa_unavailable: No available 2FA methods found. Please try another account.
error.2fa_invalid: Error while validating 2FA code. Please try again.

abort.protocol_error: A protocol exception occurred. Please report this error and try again later.
abort.unknown_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
